languages.text: "Несмотря на то, как я выгляжу, я способен разобраться с врагами — по крайней мере не хуже искалеченного арбитра. Так что от протекции, пожалуй, откажусь".

traits.locale_text: "Несмотря на то, как я выгляжу, я способен разобраться с врагами — по крайней мере не хуже искалеченного арбитра. Так что от протекции, пожалуй, откажусь".

languages.text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на то, как я выгляжу, я способен разобраться с врагами — по крайней мере не хуже искалеченного арбитра. Так что от протекции, пожалуй, откажусь".

traits.locale_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."
"Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

"Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

languages.text: 「見た目はともかく、俺は十分に攻撃者に対処できる。少なくとも、負傷したアービトレイターよりは劣らないはず。ご厚意はありがたいけど、お申し出は辞退するね」
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: 「見た目はともかく、俺は十分に攻撃者に対処できる。少なくとも、負傷したアービトレイターよりは劣らないはず。ご厚意はありがたいけど、お申し出は辞退するね」

languages.text: "Trotz meines Zustands bin ich bestens in der Lage, Angreifer abzuwehren. Zumindest keinen Deut weniger als ein verwundeter Arbitrator. Ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen."
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: "Trotz meines Zustands bin ich bestens in der Lage, Angreifer abzuwehren. Zumindest keinen Deut weniger als ein verwundeter Arbitrator. Ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen."

languages.text: « Malgré mon état apparent, je suis parfaitement capable de repousser d'éventuels attaquants. Tout autant qu'un arbitrator blessé, en tout cas. Permettez-moi de refuser votre offre de protection. »
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré mon état apparent, je suis parfaitement capable de repousser d'éventuels attaquants. Tout autant qu'un arbitrator blessé, en tout cas. Permettez-moi de refuser votre offre de protection. »

languages.text: «A pesar de mi estado aparente, soy perfectamente capaz de lidiar con cualquier agresión; al menos, tan bien como un Arbitrator herido. Debo declinar su oferta de protección».
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: «A pesar de mi estado aparente, soy perfectamente capaz de lidiar con cualquier agresión; al menos, tan bien como un Arbitrator herido. Debo declinar su oferta de protección».

languages.text: “尽管我的状况确实很糟糕，但我完全有能力对付袭击者，或者说，我的战斗能力并不逊于受了伤的法务官。我必须拒绝你的保护。”
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我的状况确实很糟糕，但我完全有能力对付袭击者，或者说，我的战斗能力并不逊于受了伤的法务官。我必须拒绝你的保护。”

languages.text: "Mevcut durumuma rağmen savaşabilirim, en azından yaralı bir Yargıcı için iyi durumdayım. Teklifini reddetmek zorundayım."
languages.original_text: "Despite my apparent state, I am perfectly capable of dealing with attackers — or at least no less so than an injured Arbitrator. I must decline your offer of protection."

traits.locale_text: "Mevcut durumuma rağmen savaşabilirim, en azından yaralı bir Yargıcı için iyi durumdayım. Teklifini reddetmek zorundayım."
